name: Karirpad
description: Effective June 1, 2022, Karirpad (the first Applicant Tracking System in Indonesia) joins Jobseeker Company, becoming Jobseeker Software. With Jobseeker Software, stop using other job portals and start building your own job portal.
Headline: Karirpad (the first ATS in Indonesia) joins Jobseeker Company, becoming Jobseeker Software.
ShortDescription: Effective June 1, 2022, Karirpad (the first Applicant Tracking System in Indonesia) joins Jobseeker Company, becoming Jobseeker Software.

Highlights.name: Executive Search
Highlights.description: At our executive search service, we excel as proficient headhunters, specializing in swiftly connecting your company with top-tier professionals who not only meet but exceed your expectations. Backed by a proven track record, we ensure a seamless hiring process, promptly delivering high-caliber candidates tailored to your unique needs.

Highlights.name: Talent Augmentation
Highlights.description: Augment your team with proficient professionals for specified durations and utilize our skilled talent for particular projects without making long-term commitments.

Highlights.name: Software Development Augmentation
Highlights.description: We are experts in designing responsive websites for medium to complex projects and turning your ideas into dynamic mobile apps with advanced features.

enhanced_description: Karirpad, now operating as Jobseeker Software since June 1, 2022, is recognized as the first Applicant Tracking System (ATS) in Indonesia. It empowers large and global enterprises to move beyond traditional job portals by building their own custom, branded job portals. This is supported by services including comprehensive website and mobile app development tailored for recruitment. The platform also offers specialized HR services such as executive search for top-tier professionals, and talent augmentation to provide proficient staff for specified durations or projects. Additionally, it provides HR consultation and improvement services. Its primary objective is to help companies fill open positions more quickly.
key_use_cases: Streamlining applicant tracking and recruitment processes
Establishing a proprietary corporate job portal
Sourcing and recruiting top-tier executive talent
Securing temporary or project-based skilled professionals through talent augmentation
Enhancing overall HR and recruitment operations through expert consultation
Developing custom recruitment-focused websites and mobile applications
competitive_advantages: Positioned as the first Applicant Tracking System (ATS) in Indonesia
Enables companies to build custom, branded job portals to reduce reliance on third-party job boards
Offers a comprehensive suite of HR services including executive search and talent augmentation alongside core ATS functionalities
Provides integrated software development services for recruitment-specific web and mobile platforms
implementation_scenarios: Service-led HR technology adoption and process improvement
Project-based talent augmentation for specific business needs
hr_functions_supported: Recruitment (Applicant Tracking System, Candidate Sourcing, Candidate Screening)
roi_benefits: Improved quality of candidates through specialized sourcing and executive search
Potential reduction in reliance on and spend with external job boards
Increased flexibility in workforce management through temporary talent augmentation
